name: Z-Alpha
description:
Z-Alpha is a side scrolling shoot'em'up game! You will need your best flying skills to avoid getting killed and sucessfully complete each of the levels.

Features:

  • Wide variety of enemies (including bosses).
  • Power-ups (fire power, speed up, weapon add-ons) and a well known shooting mechanic (hold down FIRE button to charge weapon).
  • Selectable game difficulty.
  • Keyboard (left, right, up, down, left-control, and left-shift) and a wide variety of controllers are supported.

A playble demo (first level)  is now available. (Windows only)

Please let me know what you thing about Z-Alpha :D
